EmailTemplate.subject: Vertical Situation Display Now Available in GoDirect Flight Bag Pro v1.6
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]> In our latest update for GoDirect™ Flight Bag Pro <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]>, you can get a better strategic view of your flight path with our new, three-dimensional vertical situation display (VSD). Easily turn on Icing and turbulence weather overlays to help avoid nasty weather while flying your route!
Also included in this update is a new airport WX overlay that allows you to view airport METAR information on the map for all global airports.
We hope you find these additions helpful when planning and flying your next trip.
Thank you,
The Honeywell GoDirect Team

Our Honeywell Flight Services representatives can assist your flight department with getting GoDirect Flight Bag Pro installed and ready to go. Whether your flight crews are transitioning from the myGDC app or just need help accessing their Jeppesen charts, our team is here to help.
